name: Road to Madness
description:
Driving on a gloomy night, you find an very old house ... A red light is the last thing you remember ... now you must escape from this place of madness!

An awesome game of Horror and mystery, with an immersive original music, Click and point first person style. 

Headphones and dark room are recommended for maximum enjoyment!

Let me know how the experience was for you.

 

- Click and Point First person style.

- Interactive game 

- Original and immersive music tracks

- With inventory items

 

Move the cursor and click to interact. For inventory items you have to click and drag.
